user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mr. Thompson'"'"'s email (editor@vitalvoices.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Help Needed: Details for Reply to Mr. Thompson (Vital Voices)

Hi there,

Could you please:

1. Check my Gmail for the latest message from Mr. Thompson (editor@vitalvoices.com) regarding my potential contribution to “Vital Voices.”
2. Review any related notes or documents in my Notion workspace—especially anything tagged “Vital Voices” or “Mr. Thompson.”
3. Send me a brief summary of Mr. Thompson’s email (key points, questions, deadlines) and any pertinent background info from Notion that will help me draft an informed reply.

Many thanks for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]
